      • init

        public void init​(MPQManager manager,
                 java.lang.String filename,
                 boolean loadChildren)
          throws java.io.IOException,
                 FileReaderException,
                 MPQException
        Description copied from class: FileReader
        Init will initialize the corresponding file (ADT, WDT, WMO, M2, ...) to its file structure based on the data byte array provided in parameter.
        Specified by:
        init in class FileReader
        Parameters:
        manager - The manager of MPQ that will provide the file to extract.
        filename - The filename that is being represented by the byte data.
        loadChildren - Load the children of the file (e.g. ADT is a child of WMO).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there's any issue while reading the file.
        systems.crigges.jmpq3.JMpqException
        FileReaderException - If there's any functional issue while reading the file (File version, expected header, chunk size, ..)
        MPQException

      • render2D

        public javafx.scene.layout.Pane render2D​(Render2DType renderType)
                                  throws ModelRendererException,
                                         FileReaderException
        Description copied from class: ModelRenderer
        Render2D provides a Pane object containing a 2D representation of the requested render type.
        Specified by:
        render2D in class ModelRenderer
        Parameters:
        renderType - The type of render.
        Returns:
        A Pane object representing the object to be rendered.
        Throws:
        ModelRendererException - This method can throw a converter exception if an error occured during the rendering.
        FileReaderException - This method can throw a file reader exception if an error occured during the reading of the file.

      • render3D

        public PolygonMesh render3D​(Render3DType renderType,
                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​M2> cache)
                     throws ModelRendererException,
                            MPQException,
                            FileReaderException
        Description copied from class: ModelRenderer
        Render3D provides a PolygonMesh object containing a 3D representation of the requested render type.
        Specified by:
        render3D in class ModelRenderer
        Parameters:
        renderType - The render type that needs to be used when generating this polygon mesh.
        cache - A cache of models, in case of generation of mesh with a lot of models, this helps to speed up the mesh generation process.
        Returns:
        A PolygonMesh object representing the object to be rendered.
        Throws:
        ModelRendererException - This method can throw a converter exception if an error occured during the rendering.
        MPQException - This method can throw a MPQ exception if a file to be extracted from the MPQ doesn't exist in the MPQ libraries.
        FileReaderException - This method can throw a File Reader Exception if an extracted file is malformed.
